sentences.en: (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.cn: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

sentences.en: an unusual feature
sentences.cn: 不寻常的特点

sentences.en: He spoke with a seriousness that was unusual in him.
sentences.cn: 他说话时神情少有地认真。

sentences.en: He was a very unusual musician inasmuch as he was totally deaf.
sentences.cn: 他是完全失聪的，从这点上来说，他是个很了不起的音乐家。

sentences.en: Her gaze sharpened, as if she had seen something unusual.
sentences.cn: 她眼睛一亮，仿佛看见了什么不寻常的事情。

sentences.en: Her voice was imbued with an unusual seriousness.
sentences.cn: 她的声音里充满着一种不寻常的严肃语气。

sentences.en: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances.
sentences.cn: 我在非同寻常的环境下长大。

sentences.en: It is not unusual for women to work a 40-hour week.
sentences.cn: 女性一周工作40小时并不少见。

sentences.en: It’s not unusual  (= it is quite common ) to feel very angry in a situation like this.
sentences.cn: 遇到这样的情况觉得非常生气是很正常的。

sentences.en: It’s unusual for Dave to be late.
sentences.cn: 戴夫迟到是很少见的。

sentences.en: It's unusual for the trees to flower so early.
sentences.cn: 这种树这么早开花很不寻常。

sentences.en: Mr. Hitchens said you have solved some very unusual cases.
sentences.cn: 希钦斯先生说您破过一些非常离奇的案子。

sentences.en: Reports of the plot of this unusual film tend to excite revulsion.
sentences.cn: 有关这部不同寻常电影的情节的报道常常令人生厌。

sentences.en: She kissed him with unusual fervour.
sentences.cn: 她特别热烈地吻着他。

sentences.en: The chemical structure of this particular molecule is very unusual.
sentences.cn: 这个特殊分子的化学结构很不寻常。

sentences.en: The psychiatrist must learn to maintain an unusual degree of objectivity.
sentences.cn: 精神科医生务必要学会保持超乎寻常的客观态度。

sentences.en: The sparse line of spectators noticed nothing unusual.
sentences.cn: 那一排稀稀落落的观众没留意到任何不寻常之处。

sentences.en: They have replanted many areas with rare and unusual plants.
sentences.cn: 他们在许多地方重新种上了珍稀植物。

sentences.en: To be appreciated as a parent is quite unusual.
sentences.cn: 可怜天下父母心。

sentences.en: unusual circumstances
sentences.cn: 异常状况

words.tran_cn: 非常；异乎寻常地；显著地

trans.tran_cn: 特别的，不寻常的，独特的，别致的
trans.tran_en: different from what is usual or normal
